member.name: T:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility
member.summary: Provides basic functionality about OSC.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.GetCurrentOscAvatarConfigPath
member.summary: Gets the file path of the configuration file for the currently selected avatar.
member.returns: The file path of the configuration file for the currently selected avatar, or if no avatar is selected.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.WaitAndGetCurrentOscAvatarConfigPathAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously waits for an avatar to be selected and then gets the file path of the configuration file for the currently selected avatar.
member.param: A that can be used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: The file path of the configuration file for the currently selected avatar.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.GetOscAvatarConfigPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file path for the avatar configuration file with the specified avatar ID. If the avatar configuration file is not found, a is thrown.
member.param: The avatar ID for the avatar configuration file to be retrieved.
member.returns: The file path for the avatar configuration file with the specified avatar ID.
member.exception: Throws if the avatar configuration file is not found.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.GetOscAvatarConfigPathes
member.summary: Gets the paths to all OSC avatar config files.
member.returns: An immutable array of strings representing the paths to the OSC avatar config files.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.EnumerateOscAvatarConfigPathes
member.summary: Enumerates the paths to all OSC avatar config files.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of strings representing the paths to the OSC avatar config files.

member.summary: Registers a monitor callback with the OSC server and adds it to the list of monitor callbacks.
member.param: The callback to register and add to the list of monitor callbacks.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.UnregisterMonitorCallback(BuildSoft.OscCore.MonitorCallback)
member.summary: Unregisters a monitor callback from the OSC server and removes it from the list of monitor callbacks.
member.param: The callback to unregister and remove from the list of monitor callbacks.

member.summary: Initializes the OSC utility.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.ReadValue(BuildSoft.OscCore.OscMessageValues,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a value from the specified index in an OSC message values object.
member.param: The OSC message values object to read from.
The index of the value to read.
member.returns: The value at the specified index in the OSC message values object, or null if the value is a nil type tag.
member.exception: Thrown if the type tag at the specified index is an array start or array end type tag.

member.name: M:BuildSoft.VRChat.Osc.OscUtility.AreEqual(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified objects are equal.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns: if the specified objects are equal, otherwise .
